name: Drive Fast!
description:
Play through 3 different levels that progressively get a bit more difficult. Each level you have to collect the required number of points that is shown on the top left of the screen, while also trying to avoid having the timer reach zero. Each level will have some powerups that may help you win or can even make you lose, so be careful on which powerups to collect! 

*Please click on the How to Play button when starting the game to learn more about the controls and what each powerup does* 

Made by Edwin Aguirre

Assets used:

Art

CITY package

Low Poly Cars

Skybox add-on

STYLIZED: Free Drift Car

 

Font

Free Pixel Font - Thaleah

 

Music

Eric Skiff - A Night Of Dizzy Spells

Jeremy Blake - Powerup!

Joshua McLean - Mountain Trials

 

Sounds

https://www.leshylabs.com/apps/sfMaker/
